title: 【生存地图】Chaotic land(input by canper)！
author: 豪哥2012
txt_content:
Welcome to Rcraft!

I think anyone should have heard of "pangu epoch-making"?
But now, this is the "Steve epoch-making"!
Chaos flat world

Boundless darknessSteve was born in this time. Now he wants to change everything around him!Metal wood fire soil water and an axe are you only tool!
Are you ready?Find the only a crack.Change your world!(In order to eliminate BUG.Map slightly modified)Welcome marinated egg to translation! @geludan……

replies.author: g-g-g
replies.txt_content:
欢迎来到rcraft！
我认为任何人都应该听说过“盘古开天辟地”？
但现在，这是“steve时代”！
平坦的混沌世界
无限的黑暗
steve出生在这个时代。他现在想改变他周围的一切！
金木火土水和斧头是你仅有的工具！【五行？】
准备好了吗？
寻找仅有的一个裂缝
改变你的世界！
